dmca.title: [Fwd: FW: [EV1-C1976176J] Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006 infringments- EchoStar_N
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:mikek@nr-online.com] 
Sent: Thursday, December 14, 2006 10:35 AM
To: Legal Response
Subject: RE: [Fwd: FW: [EV1-C1976176J] Pakistan v West Indies Series
2006 infringments- EchoStar_NRID14166]



Dear Sirs, thank you for your response.

It appears to me that the site has returned to your network (IP address
is 209.85.48.7) The site continues to offer web streams of cricket- in
this case it is offering streams of the Ashes Series between Australia
and England. Please see the screenshot below. I also enclose a letter of
authority from our client, Cricket Australia. The Third game in the
series began last night and continues until Monday- so it is obviously
imperative that the site is prevented from streaming the cricket as
quickly as possible. 

Please advise what action you can take against the site.

I, Mike Kiernan, hereby state that Cricket Australia is the owner of the
exclusive rights referenced above and that NetResult is authorised to
act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and compliance. On
behalf of Cricket Australia, I hereby state that I have a good faith
belief that use of the content in the manner complained of is not
authorised by Cricket Australia, its agents, or the law.

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult hereby digitally sign
this e-mail message under penalty of perjury under the laws of the
United States of America with the additional statement under penalty of
perjury that the information in the notice is accurate.

Regards,

Mike Kiernan 

NetResult

 

 

Mike Kiernan

Account Executive

Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House,
583 Fulham Road,
London,
SW6 5UA 

mikek@nr-online.com <mailto:mikek@nr-online.com> 
http://www.nr-online.com <http://www.nr-online.com/>  

tel: 
  

+44 (0)20 7471 1733
 

  


-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Legal Response Team [mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com
<mailto:LegalResponse@theplanet.com> ]
Sent: 08 December 2006 21:13
To: MikeK@nr-online.com
Subject: [Fwd: FW: [EV1-C1976176J] Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006
infringments- EchoStar_NRID14166]

Please note that the domain referenced in your DMCA notice does not
reside within our network as of 03:12 PM --600 (Central Standard Time),
Friday, December 08  2006.

--
The Planet-EV1 Legal Response Team
https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal
<https://www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=legal> 
(214)782-7800 :: 1-800-377-6103
Fax:: (214) 782-7756





-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Kiernan [mailto:MikeK@nr-online.com
<mailto:MikeK@nr-online.com> ]
Sent: Friday, December 08, 2006 4:34 AM
To: Copyright
Subject: FW: [EV1-C1976176J] Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006
infringments- EchoStar_NRID14166

Dear Sirs,

I don't understand why the fact that you need to log-in to
www.wahegurson.com is relevent? We have been trying to take action
against this site for some time as it is breaking the copyright of two
of our clients. We have provided a large amount of evidence that the
site is offering illegal streams of cricket. I include screenshots that
makes it absolutely clear that this is the case. In one of the
screenshots the site owner says "WE TELECAST TODAY PAK VS WI".

One of our clients, Echostar Satellite L.L.C, are being infringed by the
site offering illegal streams of the Pakistan v West Indies Series. I
feel I must warn you that Echostar are currently looking to prosecute
errant ISPs, and a failure to cooperate over this issue will leave us
with little choice but to recommend ThePlanet as a potential candidate
for such action. This is not a course of action that we wish to take, as
NetResult has enjoyed a good relationship with ThePlanet in the past.

Please take action against this site as soon as possible.

Regards,

Mike Kiernan


-----Original Message-----
From: Copyright [mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com
<mailto:Copyright@theplanet.com> ]
Sent: 30 November 2006 18:25
To: mikek@nr-online.com
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org
Subject: FW: [EV1-C1976176J] Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006
infringments- EchoStar_NRID14166

 To Whom It May Concern:

The URL in question is currently not accessible as of 12:26:22 p.m.
(GMT-6) on November 30, 2006 because it requires proprietary log-in
information to access it.

Legal Response Team
The Planet

MIME element (text/plain)
Echostar: Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006 infringments-
EchoStar_NRID14166

NetResult Internal Reference:  EchoStar_NRID14166

Please quote the above EchoStar_NRID14166 reference in all
communications with us regarding this issue.


Dear Sirs,

We write on behalf of EchoStar Satellite L.L.C. ("EchoStar") which owns
and/or controls broadcast rights in North America for Pakistan v West
Indies Series 2006.

We have noticed that your website, http://www.waheguruson.com
<http://www.waheguruson.com>  is displaying, promoting and/or offering
A/V content from the Pakistan v West Indies Series 2006.

We wish to make you aware that your present, unauthorized display of
such A/V content is an infringement of EchoStar's exclusive intellectual
property rights under national and international copyright laws.  On
behalf of EchoStar, I hereby demand that you immediately cease all such
infringements on any and all web sites (and elsewhere) and confirm to
NetResult within two (2) business days of the date of this letter, via
return email, that you have done so.  Your failure to comply with this
demand will expose to you civil and criminal liability.  Govern yourself
accordingly.

Nothing in this letter is intended or shall be construed to constitute
an express or implied waiver of any of EchoStar's rights or remedies,
all of which are expressly reserved.

Formal Declaration

I, Mike Kiernan, hereby state that EchoStar are the owners of the
exclusive rights to the A/V content referenced above and that NetResult
is authorized to act on EchoStar's behalf with respect to internet
monitoring and compliance related to infringement of such rights.

On behalf of EchoStar, I hereby state that I have a good faith belief
that use of such A/V content in the manner complained of is not
authorized by EchoStar, its agents, or the law.

I, Mike Kiernan, as a representative of NetResult, hereby swear, under
penalty of perjury under the laws of the United States of America, that
the information in this notification is accurate and that NetResult is
authorised to act on its behalf with respect to internet monitoring and
compliance.

We thank you for your timely and full cooperation.

Yours sincerely,


Mike Kiernan


NetResult
A Division of Projector NetResult Ltd
Mulberry House
583 Fulham Road
London
UK SW6 5UA

Head Office: Projector NetResult Ltd, 8 Wye Street, Hereford, UK HR2 7RB


Please note, if this email has been sent to the wrong recipient, please
accept our apologies, inform us of the error, and forward this e-mail
immediately to the correct person or department for action.
